attributes.action: Give all Kurds who have been living in UK for more than 3yrs a british passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My friend came from Kurdistan,as been living here.He came here because of safety,he was a soldier in kurdistan. He had to go on the run,he now lives with my best mate. She lost her husband 5yrs ago and was left with 7girls. She got with my friend and they fell in love,they want to marry,but didnt want to marry for conveince of a british passport,1yr after being together she found out she was pregnant,they now have 1 son plus the 7girls to bring up together,they are very happy together. His parents are back home in Kurdistan,his mum as cancer,and if he goes home he loses his family over here.And he will be killed by the people he ran out on.He has done everything by the book here,I think he deserves a british passport,please help him and many others alike to achieve this.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
